title: Niece ‘had incestuous sex with uncle while living with her mother’
text:
Elizabeth Wilford and her uncle Michael Dye have been charged with having an incestuous sexual relationship while living under the same roof as Wilford’s mother (Pictures: Greene County Sheriff’s Office)

A niece had an incestuous sexual relationship while living with her mother, sheriff’s deputies say.

Elizabeth Willfond, 30, reportedly admitted the consensual affair with Michael Dye, 42, to detectives after accusing him of assault in Little Rock, Arkansas, on September 19.

An affidavit from Green County Sheriff’s Office Captain Tony Williams said: ‘During the interview, Mrs Willfond admitted that she and Dye have had sexual intercourse three or four times while they were living in the trailer on her mother’s property.

‘I asked Mrs Willfond if she had consensual sex with him and she stated he had never forced her to have sex with him, so I assumed that the sexual intercourse was consensual.’

It is unclear who Wilford is married to, with both her and Dye subsequently charged with incest, KAIT reported.

Their alleged illegal relationship was uncovered after Willfond called cops Dye had tied a rope around her neck and assaulted her.

She said the attack was so severe she was unable to talk, and had her hands around her throat in a bid to loosen the makeshift noose.

The couple are said to have been arguing in Dye’s truck at the time of the attack, prompting him to reach into the back to grab the cord.

Willford has since bonded out of Greene County Detention Center, while Dye is still behind bars.
description: Elizabeth Willford reportedly embarked on an illegal affair with her uncle while living under her mother's roof in Little Rock, Arkansas
